articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Intel’s $180 Arc A580 aims for budget gaming builds, but it’s a hard sell - Ars Technica
articles.description: But cheap Arc A750 cards make the A580 feel redundant, at least for now.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Intel's Alchemist GPU silicon, the heart of the Arc A750, A770, and now, the A580.
11 with 
Intel's Arc GPUs aren't bad for what they are, but a relatively late launch and driver problems … [+2908 chars]
